title: Masculine and Feminine: Their Common Vocation and Their Distinct Vocations
description:
This video looks at masculinity and femininity in light of the universal spousal vocation, that is, the call to holiness and union with God, lived out either as a male or as a female person in a given state of life.

Randos United, Meant to Marry? https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=R6JOf6jfMOk

Mulieris Dignitatem, On the Dignity of a Woman, apostolic letter by Pope John Paul II: http://www.vatican.va/content/john-paul-ii/en/apost_letters/1988/documents/hf_jp-ii_apl_19880815_mulieris-dignitatem.html

How to pronounce my last name: The "c" is silent just to confuse people.

Randos United: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCEzWTLDYmL8soRdQec9Fsjw 

Paul's channel: https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCGsDIP_K6J6VSTqlq-9IPlg 

Me on Paul's channel:
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=EN-PQ3uUm4Y
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=mSiXzJkIj0c
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=WdlMtQSKszc
